mod.description: A centralized location for some of atra's helper code.
IllFormatedConfig: Config file seems ill-formated, using default. Please use Generic Mod Config Menu to configure.
ShowRegenNumbers.title: Show Regen Numbers
ShowRegenNumbers.description: If enabled, little numbers will appear when health or stamina is being regenerated by equips.
